product_name: Goal Zero AA Rechargeable Batteries - Package of 4
long_description: Couple these four Goal Zero AA rechargeable batteries with the Guide 10 Plus Adventure Kit (sold separately) to breathe solar power into them over and over, wherever you wander under the sun.
short_description: Couple these four Goal Zero AA rechargeable batteries with the Guide 10 Plus Adventure Kit (sold separately) to breathe solar power into them over and over, wherever you wander under the sun.
